name: Confirmation Bias
description: Tendency to favor information that confirms existing beliefs.

name: Anchoring
description: Relying too heavily on the first piece of information encountered.

name: Availability Heuristic
description: Overestimating the importance of information that comes to mind easily.

name: Dunning-Kruger Effect
description: Overestimating one's competence in unfamiliar areas.

name: Negativity Bias
description: Giving more weight to negative experiences over positive ones.
